
set(TARGET_NAME mbedtls)

include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)

file(GLOB_RECURSE MBEDTLS_HEADER_FILES RELATIVE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} include/*.h)
file(GLOB_RECURSE MBEDTLS_SOURCE_FILES RELATIVE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} library/*.c)

set(ALL_CODE_FILES ${MBEDTLS_HEADER_FILES} ${MBEDTLS_SOURCE_FILES})
GROUP_FILES(ALL_CODE_FILES)

add_library(${TARGET_NAME} STATIC ${ALL_CODE_FILES})
set_target_properties(${TARGET_NAME} PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE CXX FOLDER "libraries")
